attributes.action: Save HMS Onyx Submarine that is due to be cut up for scrap soon
attributes.additional_details: HMS Onyx was decommissioned several years ago and has now been sold on for scrap, she has recently been moved to Rosneath prior to being cut up. This Submarine served in the Falklands War and Cold War, she will make an excellent museum attraction as one of the last conventional Submarines to have served her country so well.  She can be saved for so little money.
